author: Bootle
title: Madame Tussauds to exhibit waxworks of all six James Bonds | Photos | Internatio
text: I still like the Sean Connery movies best but Daniel Craig is moving up the rankings as best bond ever. Let's hope SPECTRE is as good as movie as they are evil. The movies jumped the shark with Moonraker but Craig and the new team have brought it back to relevancy.
